name: Burgurr Blitz
description:
Welcome to your Pattywhack Diner orientation! Learn how to make BURGURRS with our special BARK PIG (contains 0% bark and % pig.) 

Read customer comments, assemble sandwiches to order, and always listen to management no matter how ridiculous the request. You better be a quick learner! One wrong move will send you to the curb.

Rated T for language. Made using Renpy.
